dialogue.text: O great Chastity! Be free!
(And please be normal.)
And free I am. Thank you great general.
Blushes (oh no he's hot!!!)
What's wrong?
Nothing. I just... (look at those glutes)
Are you...staring at my...?
General. Get your mind out of the gutter. I am Chastity, and I am...
Do you lift General?
...aaaand off we go to face the Mistress of Wrath
Gah! I always get matched with noobs! You people are terrible! Reported!
Oooh. What game is that? I play an online game where I make a super muscular barbarian with abs and...
You people? Why are you here? Can't you see I'm busy?
How did you Virtues lose to these people?
They have monsters, some of which are quite...distracting.
Fine! I'll be down to fight in just a moment. Let me just leave a quick comment on the new outrage of the day! Did you hear the Duke and Duchess of Lust have been caught in illicit activities?
wat?
That's awful! General, don't you think that's terrible?
Well. I mean maybe it wouldn't be so terrible. You know. If it's with you.
I'm beginning to despair.
I lost? To a bunch of noobs like you? How? Reported!
General. That was quite the display of...*ahem* battle prowess.
You know they say that a man's swordplay is indicative of--
1: 10 bucks on 'will they'.
2: 20 on 'won't they'.
Oh no. They're starting to infect my troops.
G-General!
Let me guess, we have to free a virtue before we face the Duke and Duchess of Lust?
Handsome and smart?
What?
What?
Um. Well, am I right?
Yes. We must free the Order of Patience.
All right. Let's go.
...I hate seeing him go, but I sure do love watching him leave.
random comment.
random reply.
